channel.description: UT BIBLE by ocr*flocutus - News Credits This guide wouldn`t have been possible without the help of the following people: NUB=Garfield, who helped me A LOT with everything sourcecode related. Without him you would see lots of expressions like "I think", "my experience shows" or "approximately" in this guide, cause only he gave me all the facts about UT. Especially his work on the weapon stats has been great. [NewNet]Sloci_da_Voievode, who was responsible for all the html and the logo. A wonder, that he made something readable, even something with a nice design out of my txt-file mess (-; All the players from my clan Ocrana for beta testing. ...and last but not least Epic for making Unreal Tournament <<< back | top Unreal Tournament and the stylized "U" are trademarks of Epic Games, Inc. All other tradmarks are the property of their respective companies. � 2000/2001 - Florian Bl�mm
